title: Expand learning units and extend minigame duration

requirements.text: Add more conversation scenarios and culture entries to the backend data for each of the 6 African languages (Arabic, Swahili, Hausa, Amharic, Yoruba, Zulu) to create additional learning path units beyond the current content
acceptanceCriteria: Each language has at least 3-5 additional conversation scenarios
Each language has at least 3-5 additional culture entries
New content is properly seeded in the backend main actor
Content is organized to create at least 2-3 additional units in the learning path

requirements.text: Increase the time limits for all minigames (Word Match, Sentence Builder, Vocabulary Quiz, Listening Comprehension, Repeatable Challenge) to make gameplay sessions longer
acceptanceCriteria: Time limits in difficulty.ts are increased by at least 50% for all difficulty levels
All five minigame components reflect the extended time limits
Users have more time to complete each minigame round

requirements.text: Increase the number of questions or items per minigame session to extend gameplay duration beyond just time limits
acceptanceCriteria: Word Match game has more word pairs per session
Sentence Builder has more sentences to construct
Vocabulary Quiz and Listening Comprehension have more questions per session
Repeatable Challenge has an increased question count
Item count scaling in difficulty.ts is adjusted upward

constraints: Maintain the single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
Preserve the existing learning path node limit of 20 from learningPathLimit.ts
Keep all existing minigame mechanics and UI patterns intact
Ensure new content follows the same structure as existing conversation scenarios and culture entries
nonGoals: Adding new minigame types or game modes
Changing the learning path visualization or layout
Modifying the XP reward system or progression model
Adding new languages beyond the existing 6
Changing authentication or user profile functionality
